typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> newFile
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> existingTable
newFile derive(fingerprint = sha2(256,columns())) ~> rowSignature
existingTable derive(fingerprint1 = sha2(256,columns())) ~> rowSignature1
rowSignature, rowSignature1 exists(fingerprint == fingerprint1,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(input(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt_inv as double,
		term as string,
		int_rate as double,
		installment as double,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as double,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as boolean,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as double,
		delinq_2yrs as double,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as double,
		mths_since_last_delinq as double,
		mths_since_last_record as double,
		open_acc as double,
		pub_rec as double,
		revol_bal as double,
		revol_util as double,
		total_acc as double,
		initial_list_status as boolean,
		out_prncp as double,
		out_prncp_inv as double,
		total_pymnt as double,
		total_pymnt_inv as double,
		total_rec_prncp as double,
		total_rec_int as double,
		total_rec_late_fee as double,
		recoveries as double,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as double,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as double,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as double,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as double,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> loansSource
source(output(
		field as string,
		threshold as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> rules1
rules1 derive(threshold = toFloat(threshold)) ~> Cast
loansSource aggregate(mths_since_last_delinq_nulls = countIf(isNull(mths_since_last_delinq),1),
		next_pymnt_d = countIf(isNull(next_pymnt_d),1),
		rowcount = count(1)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 split(toFloat(mths_since_last_delinq_nulls / rowcount) > sink1#lookup('mths_since_last_delinq').threshold,
	toFloat(next_pymnt_d / rowcount) > sink1#lookup('next_pymnt_d').threshold,
	disjoint: false) ~> ruleNullChecker@(mthssincelastdelinqfail, nextpymntdfail)
Cast sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['field'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
ruleNullChecker@mthssincelastdelinqfail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(Rating = iif(year==1988,1,toInteger(Rating)),
		year = iif(year==1960,2021,toInteger(year))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(year==1988),
	insertIf(year==2021),
	deleteIf(year==1950)) ~> AlterRow1
source1 filter(year == 1988 || year == 1960 || year == 1950) ~> Filter1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'moviesdelta',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['movie','year'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 50) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 filter(year == 1980) ~> Filter1
source1 derive(currentTime = '_'+regexReplace(toString(currentTimestamp()),'\\s| |\\.|-|:','')) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 derive(releasedate = iif(year == 1980,'_'+toString(:local1)+right('0'+toString(toInteger((random(1)*12)+1)),2)+right('0'+toString(toInteger((random(2)*12)+1)),2),'_20200311'),
		local1 := year) ~> DerivedColumn2
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowFolderUrlColumn:'currentTime',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowFolderUrlColumn:'releasedate',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesCSVSource
MoviesCSVSource aggregate(groupBy(year),
	avgRatingForComedies = round(avgIf(instr(lower(genres),'comedy')>0,Rating),2)) ~> AvgComedyRatingByYear
MoviesCSVSource aggregate(groupBy(year),
	minRating = min(Rating),
		maxRating = max(Rating)) ~> minMaxRatingByYear
Filter1 derive(Favorite = true()) ~> Favorite
MoviesCSVSource filter(year == 1980) ~> Filter1
AvgComedyRatingByYear sort(desc(avgRatingForComedies, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1AvgRatingByYear
minMaxRatingByYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2MinMaxRating
Favorite sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato,
		Favorite
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3Favorites

source(output(
		Date as date,
		Open as double,
		High as double,
		Low as double,
		Close as double,
		Volume as double,
		Dividend as double,
		Split as double,
		Adj_Open as double,
		Adj_High as double,
		Adj_Low as double,
		Adj_Close as double,
		Adj_Volume as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StocksSource
Filter1 window(over(stocksymbol),
	asc(Date, true),
	startRowOffset: -7L,
	endRowOffset: 7L,
	FifteenDayMovingAvg = round(avg(Close),2)) ~> Window1
Window1 select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Close,
		FifteenDayMovingAvg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
StocksSource derive(stocksymbol = 'msft') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(High > 0) ~> Filter1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

sources.name: moviesCSV
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 20)) ~> moviesCSV

sources.name: SQLMovies
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLMovies

sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['mymovies.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared moviesCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/moviesDB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared SQLMovies = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("maksqldb.database.windows.net", "makaw"),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "Movies"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = moviesCSV,
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [year] <> "-1980"),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"RottenTomato"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Removed columns", {{"movie", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Changed column type", {{"movie", Order.Ascending}}),
  #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Sorted rows", {"movie"}, SQLMovies, {"movie"}, "SQLMovies", JoinKind.LeftOuter),
  #"Changed column type 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Merged queries", {{"title", type text}, {"genres", type text}, {"year", Int64.Type}, {"Rating", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Expanded SQLMovies" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Changed column type 1", "SQLMovies", {"movie", "title", "genres", "year", "Rating", "RottenTomato"}, {"SQLMovies.movie", "SQLMovies.title", "SQLMovies.genres", "SQLMovies.year", "SQLMovies.Rating", "SQLMovies.RottenTomato"})
in
  #"Expanded SQLMovies";

sources.name: moviesCSV
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> moviesCSV

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared moviesCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/moviesDB.csv"),

  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = moviesCSV
in
  Source;

	validateSchema: false,

	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared moviesCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/moviesDB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared SQLMovies = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("maksqldb.database.windows.net", "makaw"),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "Movies"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = moviesCSV,
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"movie", Int64.Type}})
in
  #"Changed column type";

sources.name: MoviesD2
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesD2

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared MoviesD2 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/moviesDB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = MoviesD2
in
  Source;

parameters{
	logger as boolean (false())
}
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split($logger,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(logon, logoff)
ConditionalSplit1@logon aggregate(rowcount = count(1)) ~> RowCount
ConditionalSplit1@logoff sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
RowCount sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['rowcounts.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LogRowCounts

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source2, source1 exists(source2@movie == source1@movie,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 alterRow(deleteIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source2 aggregate(rowcount = count(1)) ~> RowCount
source1 derive(rowcounts = cachedSink#outputs().rowcount) ~> DerivedColumn1
RowCount sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> cachedSink
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', (toInteger(cachedSink#output().rowcount))),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> sink2

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(P01_Ind = 'P01_Ind',
		P02_Ind = 'P02_Ind',
		P03_Ind = 'P03_Ind') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 unpivot(output(
		Indicator as string,
		P01_Ind as string,
		P02_Ind as string,
		P03_Ind as string
	),
	ungroupBy(movie),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(mycols = sha2(256,columns())),
	each(match(true()), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctRows
DistinctRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(contains(array(columns()),isNull(#item)),
	disjoint: false) ~> LookForNULLs@(hasNULLs, noNULLs)
LookForNULLs@hasNULLs sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
Filter2, Filter1 union(byName: true)~> Union1
source2 filter(title == 'Sabotage') ~> Filter1
source1 filter(title == 'Fury') ~> Filter2
Union1 sink(rowFolderUrlColumn:'',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(output(
		data as ({@context} as string, action as string, actor as ({@context} as string, id as string, type as string), edApp as ({@context} as string, id as string, type as string), eventTime as string, extensions as (distributor as ({@context} as string, id as string, type as string)), federatedSession as (dateCreated as string, id as string, messageParameters as (TC_agreed as boolean, alternate_return_url as string, b2launch as boolean, base_url as string, book_kind as string, book_location as string, book_type as string, bookmeta_id as integer, bookmeta_vbid as long, context_id as string, context_label as string, context_title as string, course as string, custom_action as string, custom_caliper_federated_session_id as string, custom_caliper_profile_url as string, custom_error_url as string, custom_mobile_device_launch as boolean, custom_parent_context_id as string, custom_position as string, custom_resource_id as string, custom_tc_profile_url as string, custom_tool_consumer_application as string, custom_tool_consumer_course_id as string, custom_tool_consumer_instance_guid as string, custom_tool_consumer_instance_name as string, custom_tool_consumer_multi_institution_type as string, custom_tool_consumer_multi_institution_value as string, custom_tool_consumer_plugin_version as string, custom_tool_consumer_time_zone as short, custom_tool_consumer_user_id as string, custom_tool_consumer_user_mobile_lauch_setting as string, custom_tool_consumer_user_pc_launch_setting as string, custom_tool_consumer_vendor as string, custom_tool_consumer_version as string, ext_launch_id as string, ext_launch_presentation_css_url as string, ext_lms as string, first_name as string, full_name as string, is_TC as boolean, is_adopted as boolean, is_ref_only as boolean, last_name as string, launch_class as string, launch_presentation_document_target as string, launch_presentation_locale as string, launch_presentation_return_url as string, launch_return as boolean, lis_person_sourcedid as string, location as string, lti_message_type as string, lti_sequence_ident as string, lti_version as string, pay_term as string, publisher_id as short, publisher_urn as long, raw_roles as string, resolved_course as integer, resource_link_id as string, result_message as string, result_message_key as string, result_status as short, roles as string, service_path as string, sku as string, strategy as string, tactic as string, tenant_id as integer, tenant_user_access_token as string, tenant_user_id as integer, tool_consumer_instance_contact_email as string, tool_consumer_instance_description as string, tool_consumer_instance_guid as string, tool_consumer_instance_name as string, user_id as string, vbid as string), startedAtTime as string, type as string, user as (id as string, type as string)), generated as (annotated as (id as string, isPartOf as (id as string, type as string), name as string, type as string), annotator as (id as string, type as string), dateCreated as string, id as string, type as string), group as (id as string, type as string), id as string, object as string, searchTerm as string, session as ({@context} as string, id as string, type as string), target as (id as string, index as boolean, isPartOf as (id as string, type as string), name as string, type as string), type as string)[],
		dataVersion as string,
		sendTime as string,
		sensor as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> source1
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 foldDown(unroll(data),
	mapColumn(
		{@context} = data.{@context},
		action = data.action,
		actor = data.actor,
		edApp = data.edApp,
		eventTime = data.eventTime,
		extensions = data.extensions,
		federatedSession = data.federatedSession,
		generated = data.generated,
		group = data.group,
		id = data.id,
		object = data.object,
		searchTerm = data.searchTerm,
		session = data.session,
		target = data.target,
		type = data.type,
		dataVersion,
		sendTime,
		sensor
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 select(mapColumn(
		{@context},
		action,
		actor,
		edApp,
		eventTime,
		extensions,
		federatedSession,
		generated,
		group,
		id,
		object,
		searchTerm,
		session,
		target,
		type,
		dataVersion,
		sendTime,
		sensor
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source2 derive(MovieGenres = @(Genres=split(genres,'|'),
		Title=title)) ~> MakeHierarchy
MakeHierarchy derive(genres1 = MovieGenres.Genres,
		title1 = MovieGenres.Title) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(upperCase = map(columnNames(),upper(#item)),
		listIndexes = mapIndex(columnNames(),#index),
		sortarray = sort(map(columnNames(),lower(#item)), compare(#item1, #item2)),
		sliceArray = slice(array(toString(columns())),:sizeOfColumnsArray-2),
		findElements = find(columnNames(),left(toString(#item),1)=='R'),
		filterElements = filter(columnNames(),left(toString(#item),1)=='R'),
		sizeOfColumnsArray := size(array(toString(columns())))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(origin=='DerivedColumn1'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
